original_title: UFC on Fox 20: Holm vs. Shevchenko
overview: UFC on Fox 20: Holm vs. Shevchenko was a mixed martial arts event held on July 23, 2016 at United Center in Chicago, Illinois.  The event was headlined by a women's bantamweight bout between former UFC Women's Bantamweight Champion Holly Holm and multiple-time Muay Thai world Champion Valentina Shevchenko.
title: UFC on Fox 20: Holm vs. Shevchenko
